personalInfo.kanjiName: トーレス デビッド
personalInfo.furiganaName: とーれす でびっど

workExperience.summary:
Outsourcing development company.
 As lead developer, interview new clients to help hire the best developers
that fit their needs, as well as know their onboarding process to make it
easier for new hires to start their development task as soon as possible.

*As Sr. Software Developer,:
I help with the planning and development of
client products for quicker deployment of their MVPs, working mostly on
Backend, and business logic, and integrating 3rd party APIs.

I’ve been in different projects:
* IOT backend system,:
Maintaining the CRM and developing new features
for a BLE API to deliver Ads to mobile phones.

* Sport tracking system:
 Migrated the current API from ruby to Laravel, and
improved the tracking algorithm and interaction for 3rd party APIs.

* QA engineer:
For a health app to help diagnose early brain deterioration,
making sure the acceptance criteria was met, and helped with the Spanish
translations.

* Full Stack Developer:
For a Fraud Detection and Alert system, to detect
possible fraud on a monitored Address and Alert Real Estate Agencies.

Framework Science Teamstation A.I Platform
This is an internal product that helps company customers know of our hiring process and gives transparency on how the technical evaluations are made to select future company employees.
highlights: As part of the Teamstation A.I platform, I was in charge of maintaining the API as well as develop new features, from requirements to delivery as I was also in charge of deployments and server / database maintainance

workExperience.summary:
First Kontact 
Is a regional call center that provides technical support to
different companies. 
There I maintained their in-house CRM built with
adobe flex, and created scripts to automate the generation of reports for
different clients and different internal branches.

Jelp App:
Is a startup born from the call center. 
We started the development of an internal chat application that grew into a full SaaS for
tracking delivery of products. 
We used Laravel as our main development framework for the API that is used by a large number of mobiles and web apps.
highlights: Help design Jelp App from scratch, having the initial role of Sr. Developer and moved to DevOps, in charge of infrastructure and deployments.

workExperience.summary:
Outsourcing development company
As part of a two-person team, I helped the Sr. developer fixing bugs as well
as planning new modules for the web application, using Laravel as the
main framework.
Working with the same client, I configured and set up their WordPress site
using one of the themes that the client liked and bought.

Call Center services, In my first time there I was put in charge of helping
the Sr. Developer maintain their in house build CRM, I design and created
reports for the Workforce department using PHP, these reports helped
find markers for tracking call time and improved their business rules.

Under a 1-month contract, I was sent to a TV manufacturer as part of the
outsourcing team, there I created a mini application using C# that
automated the retrieval and printing of code orders.

This was a small import and distribution company, as their only IT, I
maintained their internal network, using google cloud print I eliminated
their hassle of sending files to a single person email that was in charge of
printing.
I started the development of an API using ASP.NET, and also developed
the android mobile client using Phone Gap.
highlights: Created an MVP for an API with the purpose of controlling the internal inventory and the different distribution channels.

workExperience.summary:
Call Center services, as part of the IT team, I was in charge of giving tech
support to the different areas of the company, and help in the networking
of image deployment for their computers.
highlights:
Created scripts for unattended installation of the different software
needed for their various campaigns, this helped reduce the time spent in
the deployment of the software.

workExperience.summary:
Outsourcing development, as part of a 3-man team, we built a system that
centralized patient information for a dental clinic, this eliminated the
constant trips to the different branches to collect patient data, and
automated the collection of insurance.
highlights: The system helped optimize the patient appointments, and have a full detail of dental history.
